title: NDDB Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 02 Deputy Manager and Other Posts
description: The National Dairy Development Board (NDDB) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 02 Deputy Managers, Bearer Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.Sc, MVS.c, Ph.D, and  10th Pass can grab this chance and apply for the NDDB Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts.
